ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TAB>4<TAB>The response is relevant to the context but lacks some naturalness in phrasing, maintaining persona consistency and overall quality are good. Short note: Could be more direct while still being polite.

baseline_no_context<TAB>2<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>3<TAB>Short note: The response is contextually irrelevant but maintains persona consistency and overall quality are good, lacks naturalness in phrasing due to the absence of personalized language.

The response is highly relevant, consistent with the persona of a strict and fair Gatekeeper who upholds security protocols without being unnecessarily harsh or dismissive. The language used maintains naturalness while firmly enforcing rules.
